text: Bormolini in 2018 Thomas Bormolini (born 29 August 1991 in Sondalo) is an Italian biathlete. He competed in the 2014/15 world cup season, and represented Italy at the Biathlon World Championships 2015 in Kontiolahti. ==Biathlon results== All results are sourced from the International Biathlon Union. ===Olympic Games=== 0 medals {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- " !Event !style="width:70px;"|Individual !style="width:70px;"|Sprint !style="width:70px;"|Pursuit !style="width:70px;"| !style="width:70px;"|Relay !style="width:70px;"| |- | align=left | 2018 Pyeongchang | 56th | 51st | 48th | — | | |} :*The mixed relay was added as an event in 2014. ===World Championships=== 9 medal {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- " !Event !style="width:70px;"|Individual !style="width:70px;"|Sprint !style="width:70px;"|Pursuit !style="width:70px;"| !style="width:70px;"|Relay !style="width:70px;"| |- | align=left | 2015 Kontiolahti | 83rd | 90th | — | — | 12th | — |- | align=left | 2016 Oslo Holmenkollen | 51st | 56th | 37th | — | 11th | — |- | align=left | 2017 Hochfilzen | 59th | 46th | 48th | — | 5th | — |} :*During Olympic seasons competitions are only held for those events not included in the Olympic program. :**The mixed relay was added as an event in 2005. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male biathletes Category:Biathletes at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic biathletes of Italy Category:People from the Province of Sondrio
title: Thomas Bormolini
